articles.title: Fury over early release of Chicago officer convicted of Black teenager’s murder
articles.description: Jason Van Dyke’s six-year sentence for killing Laquan McDonald was commuted by three years for ‘good behavior’
articles.content: The early release from prison of a white Chicago police officer who was sentenced to about seven years for the murder of a Black teenager in 2014 has sparked anger among relatives, community organize… [+5023 chars]

articles.author: Ally Foster
articles.title: Alleged acid bath killer’s strange texts
articles.description: A popular Sydney podcast host has shared a series of strange messages he received from a man who this week was accused of murdering his 19-year-old wife.

articles.title: Two campus officers killed at Bridgewater College in Va., suspect arrested, officials say
articles.description: A suspect was taken into custody a short time later and charged with two counts of capital murder.

articles.author: Fox News
articles.title: Oregon Democratic Gov. Kate Brown agrees to halt clemency for felons until lawsuit plays out, lawyer says
articles.description: Democratic Oregon Gov. Kate Brown has agreed to stop granting clemency for felons between Feb. 2 and March 2, according to a lawyer for a group of murder victims' relatives who are suing the governor over her progressive pardon policy.

articles.title: Robert Durst takes stand in murder trial, says he didn't kill best friend
articles.description: Real estate scion and accused killer Robert Durst took the stand in his murder trial Monday, testifying in a Southern California courtroom that he didn’t kill his close friend Susan Berman.
